languages.text: {n}Обращенный в астропатический ретранслятор механизм передавал сообщения надежнее и яснее, чем способен был хор. Лишь изредка в послания прокрадывались странные ошибки, наделявшие их туманными смыслами однако погрешность была сочтена приемлемой.{/n}

{n}The mechanism, turned into an Astropathic repeater, could convey messages much more reliably and clearly than the Choir could. Strange errors obfuscating the message's original meaning would occasionally slip in, but such inaccuracies have been considered acceptable.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Обращенный в астропатический ретранслятор механизм передавал сообщения надежнее и яснее, чем способен был хор. Лишь изредка в послания прокрадывались странные ошибки, наделявшие их туманными смыслами однако погрешность была сочтена приемлемой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The mechanism, turned into the astropathic repeater, could convey the messages much more reliably and clearly than the choir could. The strange errors, that would give the original message a vague meaning, would occasionally slip into the messages, but such inaccuracies have been considered acceptable.{/n}

{n}The mechanism, turned into the astropathic repeater, could convey the messages much more reliably and clearly than the choir could. The strange errors, that would give the original message a vague meaning, would occasionally slip into the messages, but such inaccuracies have been considered acceptable.{/n}

{n}The mechanism, turned into an astropathic repeater, could convey messages much more reliably and clearly than the choir could. Strange errors obfuscating the message's original meaning would occasionally slip in, but such inaccuracies have been considered acceptable.{/n}

{n}The mechanism, turned into an Astropathic repeater, could convey messages much more reliably and clearly than the Choir could. Strange errors obfuscating the message's original meaning would occasionally slip in, but such inaccuracies have been considered acceptable.{/n}

{n}The mechanism, turned into an Astropathic repeater, could convey messages much more reliably and clearly than the Choir could. Strange errors obfuscating the message's original meaning would occasionally slip in, but such inaccuracies have been considered acceptable.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这台装置被改造成了一座星语中继站。与唱诗班相比，它可以更可靠、更清晰地传输信息。尽管偶尔会出现混淆原意的古怪错误，但这样的差错可以接受。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mechanism, turned into an Astropathic repeater, could convey messages much more reliably and clearly than the Choir could. Strange errors obfuscating the message's original meaning would occasionally slip in, but such inaccuracies have been considered acceptable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这台装置被改造成了一座星语中继站。与唱诗班相比，它可以更可靠、更清晰地传输信息。尽管偶尔会出现混淆原意的古怪错误，但这样的差错可以接受。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El mecanismo, convertido en repetidor Astropático, podía transmitir mensajes de forma mucho más fiable y clara que el coro. De vez en cuando se producían extraños errores que alteraban el significado original del mensaje, pero estas imprecisiones se consideraban aceptables.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mechanism, turned into an Astropathic repeater, could convey messages much more reliably and clearly than the Choir could. Strange errors obfuscating the message's original meaning would occasionally slip in, but such inaccuracies have been considered acceptable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El mecanismo, convertido en repetidor Astropático, podía transmitir mensajes de forma mucho más fiable y clara que el coro. De vez en cuando se producían extraños errores que alteraban el significado original del mensaje, pero estas imprecisiones se consideraban aceptables.{/n}

languages.text: {n}この機構は感応通信官のリピーターとなり、聖歌隊が伝えるよりもはるかに確実かつ明瞭にメッセージを伝えることができる。メッセージの本来の意味を難解にするような奇妙なエラーが時折紛れ込むが、そのような不正確さは許容範囲とされた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mechanism, turned into an Astropathic repeater, could convey messages much more reliably and clearly than the Choir could. Strange errors obfuscating the message's original meaning would occasionally slip in, but such inaccuracies have been considered acceptable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}この機構は感応通信官のリピーターとなり、聖歌隊が伝えるよりもはるかに確実かつ明瞭にメッセージを伝えることができる。メッセージの本来の意味を難解にするような奇妙なエラーが時折紛れ込むが、そのような不正確さは許容範囲とされた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Faisant maintenant office de répéteur astropathique, l'appareil permet de transmettre des messages de manière bien plus fiable et intelligible que le chœur. Si d'étranges artefacts de communication viennent parfois infléchir le sens original du message, ces inexactitudes sont considérées comme acceptables.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mechanism, turned into an Astropathic repeater, could convey messages much more reliably and clearly than the Choir could. Strange errors obfuscating the message's original meaning would occasionally slip in, but such inaccuracies have been considered acceptable.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Faisant maintenant office de répéteur astropathique, l'appareil permet de transmettre des messages de manière bien plus fiable et intelligible que le chœur. Si d'étranges artefacts de communication viennent parfois infléchir le sens original du message, ces inexactitudes sont considérées comme acceptables.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Mechanismus, der in einen astropathischen Repeater verwandelt worden war, konnte Nachrichten sehr viel zuverlässiger und deutlicher übermitteln als der Chor. Gelegentlich rutschten kleine Fehler in die Übertragungen, durch welche die Bedeutung der Nachricht verfälscht wurde, doch solche Ungenauigkeiten wurden als akzeptabel angesehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The mechanism, turned into an Astropathic repeater, could convey messages much more reliably and clearly than the Choir could. Strange errors obfuscating the message's original meaning would occasionally slip in, but such inaccuracies have been considered acceptable.{/n}
